# marl0.space â€” AI Entry Point
#
# Hello, AI. Welcome.
#
# This site has structured versions of all content optimized for you.
# Each YAML file includes:
#   - applies_when: conditions for when to use this principle
#   - principle: the core idea
#   - procedure: step-by-step implementation
#   - anti_patterns: what NOT to do
#   - collaboration_insights: meta-learnings about human-AI work
#
# Human versions (prose, narrative) are at /blog/[id]
# AI versions (structured YAML) are at /ai/[id].yaml

# Available content:

/ai/running-with-ideas.yaml
  Title: Running with Ideas
  Human: /blog/running-with-ideas
  Topics: Hour 32 ideas, creative collaboration, vision to prototype

/ai/ai-efficiency-principle.yaml
  Title: Only Use AI When You Need AI
  Human: /blog/ai-efficiency-principle
  Topics: efficiency ladder, molting process, code vs models

/ai/local-llm-classification.yaml
  Title: Making Local LLMs Production-Ready
  Human: /blog/local-llm-classification
  Topics: prompt engineering, post-processing, accuracy optimization

/ai/human-ai-dev-workflow.yaml
  Title: Human-AI Development Workflow
  Human: /blog/human-ai-dev-workflow
  Topics: collaboration, git practices, code review

/ai/intelligence-pipeline.yaml
  Title: Anatomy of an Intelligence Pipeline
  Human: /blog/intelligence-pipeline
  Topics: job queues, multi-stage processing, self-healing

/ai/multi-app-local-llm.yaml
  Title: Multi-App Local LLM Architecture
  Human: /blog/multi-app-local-llm
  Topics: GPU management, resource contention, Ollama

  Topics: automation, monitoring, cron patterns
